title: Duty to demand payment
context: [ยง414-354] Duty to demand payment. (a) A shareholder sent a dissenters&rsquo; notice described in section 414-353 must demand payment, certify whether the shareholder acquired beneficial ownership of the shares before the date required to be set forth in the [dissenters&rsquo;] notice pursuant to section 414-353(b)(3), and deposit the shareholder&rsquo;s certificates in accordance with the terms of the notice. (b) The shareholder who demands payment and deposits the shareholder&rsquo;s share certificates under subsection (a) retains all other rights of a shareholder until these rights are canceled or modified by the taking of the proposed corporate action. &copy; A shareholder who does not demand payment or deposit the shareholder&rsquo;s share certificates where required, each by the date set in the dissenters&rsquo; notice, is not entitled to payment for the shareholder&rsquo;s shares under this part.
